name: EJB util jar (JMS, Hibernate, C++)
short_description: Utility classes for sending files over JMS providers like ActiveMQ, use of XDoclet generated code and Hibernate in J2EE projects. In addition code to call EJB SessionBeans from C++. Programming Language: java Libraries: XDoclet, Hibernate
